article_title: Aetna to Stop Covering Routine Use of Power Morcellator
article_text:
Aetna Inc. will stop covering routine use of the laparoscopic power morcellator this month, marking the most direct blow from a major health insurer to a surgical tool that regulators determined can spread hidden cancer in women.

The nation’s third-largest health plan with about 23 million medical members, Aetna will implement its new policy starting May 15, a spokeswoman said. Power morcellation—which is used to remove common...
